Event creation and ticketing tools
Eventbriteâs ticketing tools automatically generate a unique QR code for event tickets when your attendees complete their event registration form.

create multiple ticket types
that include a unique QR code for quick and easy registration, simple ticket management, and contactless event check-ins.

Automated ticketing tools
Unique QR codes for event tickets are automatically generated within the Eventbrite platform when your attendees complete their online event registration form.

QR code technology offers your attendees a cashless, contactless mobile payment method for add-ons such as parking, merchandise, food and drink, and more.
3

The Eventbrite Organizer app allows attendees to simply pull up their digital tickets on their smart devices and breeze through a convenient contactless event check-in with a quick scan.

Los Angeles

DIYers can make ramen or brew beer. Shoppers should swing by the various flea markets while cocktail lovers can mix up their own concoctions. Take your outings to the next level with these Los Angeles events.

Bringing the world together through live experiences
Eventbrite is a global self-service ticketing platform for live experiences that allows anyone to create, share, find and attend events that fuel their passions and enrich their lives. From music festivals, marathons, conferences, community rallies, and fundraisers, to gaming competitions and air guitar contests. Our mission is to bring the world together through live experiences.
